chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
On the Feast of the Presentation (of the Lord)

During Jesus's presentation at the temple, the sinless one presented at the altar calls us sinners to his home. His mother is there, an everlasting virgin, glorified by her son.
chunks.original_latin:
In Yppapanti . Qui sine peccato in templo est oblatus ad aram,
Nos peccatores ad sua tecta vocat. Cujus mater adest, mater sed Virgo perennis
Permanet a nato glorificata suo.
